import React, { useState } from "react"; import Header from "../components/Header"; import Footer from "../components/Footer"; interface Labor { id: number; name: string; skills: string; mobile: string; address: string; city: string; } const Home: React.FC = () => { const [laborList, setLaborList] = useState([]); const [skillSearch, setSkillSearch] = useState(""); const [citySearch, setCitySearch] = useState(""); const handleLaborRegister = (event: React.FormEvent) => { event.preventDefault(); const formData = new FormData(event.currentTarget); const newLabor: Labor = { id: laborList.length + 1, name: formData.get("name") as string, skills: formData.get("skills") as string, mobile: formData.get("mobile") as string, address: formData.get("address") as string, city: formData.get("city") as string, }; setLaborList((prev) => [...prev, newLabor]); event.currentTarget.reset(); }; const filteredLabor = laborList.filter((labor) => { return ( labor.skills.toLowerCase().includes(skillSearch.toLowerCase()) && labor.city.toLowerCase().includes(citySearch.toLowerCase()) ); }); return ( <>
{/* Two Sections */}
{/* Section 1: Customer Search */}

Search for Labor

setSkillSearch(e.target.value)} className="w-full border rounded px-4 py-2" />
setCitySearch(e.target.value)} className="w-full border rounded px-4 py-2" />
{/* Recently Added Labor List */}

Recently Added Labor:

{filteredLabor.length > 0 ? (
    {filteredLabor.map((labor) => (
  • {labor.name} ({labor.skills}, {labor.city}) {labor.mobile}
    • ))}
) : (

No labor found for the given skill and city.

)}
{/* Section 2: Labor Registration */}

Register as a Laborer

); }; export default Home;
